name: TOW Ross Is Fine Quiz | 'Friends' Seasons and Episodes | 10 Questions

questions.text: Did Ross say he was going nuts when he saw Joey and Rachel kissing?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Ross: "I'm not going nuts. Do you see me going nuts?"

questions.text: What kind of food is Ross making for his dinner party with Joey, Rachel and Charlie?
What was in Chandler's cup of coffee?
questions.explanation:
Hair.

	Monica: "That's sweet. Drink your hair."

questions.text: Which one of the triplets was throwing bagels at Chandler?
questions.explanation:
Leslie.

	Frank Jr.: "Oh, that's Frank Jr. Jr. pulling the tampons out of the lady's purse, and that's Chandler climbing on Chandler, and that's Leslie throwing bagels at him."

questions.text: Did Monica want to adopt triplets?
Which triplet did Phoebe decide to keep?
What was the name of Bill and Colleen's adopted son?
questions.explanation:
Owen.

	Owen was played by Daryl Sabara. Previously, Daryl played Juni Cortez in 'Spy Kids 1, 2 and 3'.

questions.text: How much money did Owen tell his parents Chandler gave him to keep  quiet about being told he was adopted?
questions.explanation:
50 dollars.

	Chandler: "Which technically now you should give back!"

questions.text: At the end of the episode, who did Ross give his blessing to about Joey and Rachel dating?
Did Chandler, inadvertently, tell the triplets that Phoebe gave birth to them?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Chandler: "I'm gonna go tell Emma she was an accident."
